dialogue.introduction: I'm destroyer Hamakaze. Henceforth commencing fleet duties.
dialogue.library_intro: I am Hamakaze. I participated in many fierce battles. At Leyte, I was in Kongou's ring formation. Futhermore, I seared them into my memory Musashi, Kongou and Shinano's last moments. At the fated Bounomisaki, I, Yukikaze and many others struggled to protect Yamato.
dialogue.secretary1: Isn't the wind nice today as well?
dialogue.secretary2: The 17th Destroyer Division? Ah... yes. They're dear comrades of mine. They're very... important to me.
dialogue.secretary3: Hmm, what is it Admiral!? What... just what are you doing to my armaments?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Umm... excuse me! Is it time... for the next battle yet?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Is anything wrong? Are you feeling tired? Mm, shall I prepare something nutritious for you? Will you eat it?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral. If it's a love consult, doesn't it look like there's lots of other girls who would love to do that? ...Eh? Me? N-No! I... this sort of thing... but, I'll face it head-on, investigate and put great effort into it... okay...?
dialogue.show_players_score: Information has been received from headquarters.
dialogue.equipment3: That's just the way it is. It might... be good...
dialogue.expedition_selection: That's just the way it is. It might... be good...
dialogue.resource_collection: That's just the way it is. It might... be good...
dialogue.instant_repair: That's just the way it is. It might... be good...
dialogue.development: That's just the way it is. It might... be good...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I've sustained severe damage... I'll be in the docks for a while... Nn... with your permission, please.
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems a ship's repairs have been completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: The construction seems to be completed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The mission has ended. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Yukikaze... I'm heading out...! Hamakaze, setting sail!
dialogue.night_battle: Having only anti-air battles is just boring, you know?
dialogue.mvp: I'm not an amateur who would be worked up over victory. We can't let our guard down yet. Next up is some maintenance, yes?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Kuh! I can still provide protection!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Nooo-! Nn... I can still sail...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: This pain... is nothing compared to...what Kongou and Shinano went through! I will make it to...Bounomisaki!
dialogue.sunk: Once again... I am going... to your side... Yamato...
dialogue.christmas_2014: C-christmas. It's Christmas, Admiral. Ah, this is, uh, a present from everyone in DesDiv17.
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, Happy New Year. I will be counting on you again this year.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is special right? Somehow, Hamakaze is a little bit happy too.
dialogue.fall_event_2015: Hamakaze of the 17th Corps, I'll be going at full might.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's December. And the homeport is having a year end spring cleaning. 17th Destroyer Division, on cleaning duty. Acknowledged.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun. I'd like to throw some beans with Isokaze.... Ah, I'll go look for her.
